title: How to talk to your kids about death
text:
More Paul Ryan, Speaker? Paul Ryan, Hypocrite. What Wealthy People Teach Their Children That Others Don't Talking about death with anyone is unpleasant; talking about it with someone who starts the conversation with "What does 'dead' mean?" isn't just heartbreaking - it's confounding.
 Time
